snippet.title: Red's Kingdom - Full Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Help Red explore the land in this awesome, brand new puzzle adventure.

Play now on,
   iOS  - http://apple.co/2iEylGW
   Steam  - http://bit.ly/2iVFNfr
   Mac  - http://apple.co/2jbMiIZ

Mad King Mac has kidnapped your father and stolen your golden nut! Solve puzzles and battle goons as you explore and battle your way through the kingdom.

Discover hidden treasure, collect nuts, unlock special powers and much more as you play through 17 amazing and unique areas where there's always something new to discover.

Early reviews are stunning,
“looks absolutely amazing"

"puzzles are amazing”

“levels are actually pretty stunning”

“if you love the puzzle aspects of games like Legend of Zelda, you'll probably  find a lot to admire about Red's Kingdom. And that's pretty high praise!”

“this is more akin to an action adventure game in the same vein as something like Zelda”
